attributes.action: Legalise the use of private e scooters in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Because it’s miss leading of mr Johnson to say on national tv one thing and then change his mind the next.

some on finance some purchased costing 500 - 2000 pound scooters.

But you can only use a rental scooter provided by the local rental firms 

I don’t feel it’s fair

And I’m sure the British public don’t think it’s fair either.
attributes.background:
Recently the prime minister suggested that the use of e scooters would help the environment and help safe social distance regarding the covid 19 pandemic.
So a whole load of people went out to purchase e scooters to support this great nation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Allow 'Personal Electric Vehicles' to use cycle lanes and walkways: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301014

Make electric scooters legal to reduce our carbon footprint / cut emissions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301579
